DID YOU KNOW: The Ethereum 0X0 address, composed entirely of 0s, holds over $1 M in ETH from people sending it there by accident or mining blocks without specifying an address for the reward during Ethereum’s early days. This ETH is probably lost forever. #WednesdayWisdom 💡  https://t.co/5xWJD7MnnY
